title: BN254 Extension Fields + Pairing
description: Complete BN254 extension field stubs and add pairing in crates/ecc/. C++ source: /Users/jp4g/Playground/aztec-packages/barretenberg/cpp/src/barretenberg/ecc/ (fields/field2.hpp, field6.hpp, field12.hpp, curves/bn254/pairing.hpp, pairing_impl.hpp). Port: Fq2, Fq6, Fq12 full impl, G2 types, pairing module. Branch: feat/bn254-pairing. Deps: existing bbrs-ecc. Test: e(G1,G2)==GT_one bilinearity. 1:1 faithful port. Create branch, implement, commit, push, open PR.

title: SRS Crate
description:
dispatched_by: mayor
no_merge: true

Port barretenberg SRS to Rust crate at crates/srs/. C++ source: /Users/jp4g/Playground/aztec-packages/barretenberg/cpp/src/barretenberg/srs/ (factories/crs_factory.hpp, global_crs.hpp, mem_*_crs_factory.*). Port: Crs<Curve> trait with BN254/Grumpkin specializations, CrsFactory<Curve> trait, MemBn254Crs + MemBn254CrsFactory, MemGrumpkinCrs + MemGrumpkinCrsFactory, Global CRS singleton. File-backed CRS deferred. Branch: feat/srs-crate. Deps: bbrs-ecc. Test: create CRS from known points, verify get_monomial_points(). 1:1 faithful port. Create branch, implement, commit, push, open PR.

title: Transcript Crate
description: Port barretenberg transcript to Rust crate at crates/transcript/. C++ source: /Users/jp4g/Playground/aztec-packages/barretenberg/cpp/src/barretenberg/transcript/transcript.hpp + ecc/fields/field_conversion.hpp. Port: FrCodec, BaseTranscript, TranscriptManifest, NativeTranscript=BaseTranscript+FrCodec+Poseidon2. Branch: feat/transcript-crate. Deps: bbrs-ecc, bbrs-crypto. Test: prover->export->verifier->get_challenge deterministic. 1:1 faithful port. Create branch, implement, commit, push, open PR.
